Definitions storage. Hashtable symbol -> Boolean.TRUE.

ifdefStack

java.util.Vector ifdefStack
Stack of #ifdef truth-values applying to the current line. Vector of Boolean.TRUE and Boolean.FALSE values, the first corresponding to the outermost #ifdef block. A line is assembled only if all elements are TRUE.

ifdefValue

boolean ifdefValue
Summary truth value of truthStack.
Constructor Detail

PilaWriter

public PilaWriter(java.io.Writer out)
Construct a PilaWriter writing to a given stream.
Method Detail

processLine

public void processLine()
                 throws java.io.IOException
Translate the first String in lineStack according to specific macroexpansion/translation rules.

Translates macros according to their definition. Ignores conditional lines if their #ifdef test isn't satisfied. Collects and consumes lines for the data segment. They are sent when the stream is closed.

Lines are either sent immediately to the output stream or pushed onto the lineStack.

updateIfdefValue

public void updateIfdefValue()
Update the ifdefValue field to be the summary value of ifdefStack - true iff all elements are Boolean.TRUE.

processLineStack

public void processLineStack()
Process the lineStack from the from the front. Stops when reaching the STREAM_MARKER or the stack's end.

addAndProcessCurrentLine

public void addAndProcessCurrentLine()
Add the current line to lineStack's front. Processing of line is immediately started.
